welcome.greeting: 🎁 Hello {user_first_name}! Welcome to the VFX Trading Multi-Giveaway Bot.
welcome.daily_description: 💰 DAILY: ${daily_prize} USD ⏰ Monday to Friday at 5:00 PM London Time
welcome.weekly_description: 💰 WEEKLY: ${weekly_prize} USD ⏰ Every Friday at 5:15 PM London Time
welcome.monthly_description: 💰 MONTHLY: ${monthly_prize} USD ⏰ Last Friday of each month at 5:30 PM London Time
welcome.requirements_text: ✅ Active MT5 LIVE account ✅ Be a channel member 💵 Minimum Balances: • Daily: ${daily_min_balance} USD • Weekly: ${weekly_min_balance} USD • Monthly: ${monthly_min_balance} USD
welcome.requirements_fallback: 📋 Requirements: ✅ Active Vortex-FX MT5 LIVE account ✅ Minimum balance varies by type ✅ Be a channel member
welcome.group_message: 🎁 VFX Trading Multi-Giveaway Bot To participate in any giveaway, send me a private message with /start

help.daily_rules: 💰 DAILY GIVEAWAY - ${daily_prize} USD ⏰ Participation: Monday-Friday, 1:00 AM - 16:50 PM London Time 🎯 Draw: Monday-Friday at 17:00 PM London Time 💵 Min Balance: ${daily_min_balance} USD
help.weekly_rules: 💰 WEEKLY GIVEAWAY - ${weekly_prize} USD ⏰ Participation: Monday 9:00 AM - Friday 16:55 PM London Time 🎯 Draw: Friday at 17:10 PM London Time 💵 Min Balance: ${weekly_min_balance} USD
help.monthly_rules: 💰 MONTHLY GIVEAWAY - ${monthly_prize} USD ⏰ Participation: Day 1 - Last Friday of month 16:55 PM, London Time 🎯 Draw: Last Friday at 17:15 PM London Time 💵 Min Balance: ${monthly_min_balance} USD
help.requirements_list:
✅ Be a member of this channel
✅ Active Vortex-FX MT5 LIVE account (not demo)
✅ Minimum balance varies by giveaway type (see above)
✅ One participation per giveaway type per period
help.important_rules_list:
• Each MT5 account belongs to the first user who registers it
• You can participate in ALL giveaway types simultaneously
• Independent cooldowns for each giveaway type
• Must confirm receipt of prize if you win
help.common_errors_list:
• "Account not found" → Verify the number
• "Insufficient balance" → Deposit more than $100 USD
• "Account is not LIVE" → Use real account, not demo
• "Already registered" → Only one participation per type per period
• "Account belongs to another" → Use your own MT5 account

participation.already_registered: ℹ️ Already registered for {giveaway_type} You are already participating in today's {giveaway_type} giveaway (${prize}). 🍀 Good luck in the draw! ⏰ Draw: Check schedule
participation.window_closed: ⏰ {giveaway_type} participation closed Participation window is currently closed. 🔄 Next window opens: {next_window} 💡 Stay tuned for the next opportunity!
participation.registration_in_progress: ⏳ {giveaway_type} registration in progress You already have a {giveaway_type} registration pending. Please send your MT5 account number to complete your participation.
participation.not_channel_member: ❌ Not a channel member You must be a member of the main channel to participate. 💡 Join the channel and try again.
participation.request_mt5: 🎁 Perfect {user_first_name}! ✅ You are a channel member ✅ Ready to participate in {giveaway_type} giveaway 💰 Prize: ${prize} USD 🔢 Send your MT5 account number: 💡 Valid examples: • 1234, 4444, 5555, 7777 • 8765, 3333, 6666, 8888 ⚠️ Only numbers, no spaces

view_only.todays_summary: ├─ Total participants: {total_today} ├─ Active participation windows: {active_windows}/{total_types} ├─ System status: ✅ {system_health} └─ Last data update: {last_update}
view_only.giveaway_detail: 🎯 {giveaway_type} GIVEAWAY: ├─ Prize Amount: ${prize} USD ├─ Today's Participants: {participants} ├─ Participation Window: {window_status} ├─ Activity Level: {activity_level} └─ Status: {status_description}
view_only.insights: ├─ Most active type: {most_active} ├─ Current engagement: {engagement_level} └─ System load: {system_load}
view_only.permissions_info: 💡 Your VIEW_ONLY Permissions: ✅ View today's participation statistics ✅ Check basic system health status ✅ See participation window status ❌ Advanced analytics require PAYMENT_SPECIALIST+ permissions ❌ Pending winners require higher access levels
view_only.footer: 🔄 Use the buttons below for more information or to refresh data.
view_only.permissions_detailed: 💡 VIEW_ONLY Information: • Participation trends and historical data require PAYMENT_SPECIALIST+ permissions • Winner information and pending data require higher access levels • Advanced analytics and revenue data require PAYMENT_SPECIALIST+ permissions 🔄 Statistics refresh automatically every few minutes.

stats.combined_totals: ├─ Total participants: {total_participants} ├─ Total winners: {total_winners} ├─ Total distributed: ${total_distributed}
stats.footer: 💡 Use specific commands for detailed management

rules_inline.daily_rules: 💰 DAILY GIVEAWAY - $250 USD ⏰ Participation: Monday-Friday, 1:00 AM - 4:50 PM London Time 🎯 Draw: Monday-Friday at 5:00 PM London Time 🔄 Cooldown: 30 days after winning
rules_inline.weekly_rules: 💰 WEEKLY GIVEAWAY - $500 USD ⏰ Participation: Monday 9:00 AM - Friday 5:00 PM London Time 🎯 Draw: Friday at 5:15 PM London Time 🔄 Cooldown: 60 days after winning
rules_inline.monthly_rules: 💰 MONTHLY GIVEAWAY - $1000 USD ⏰ Participation: Day 1 - Last Friday of month, London Time 🎯 Draw: Last Friday at 5:30 PM London Time 🔄 Cooldown: 90 days after winning
rules_inline.requirements:
✅ Be a member of this channel
✅ Active MT5 LIVE account (not demo)
✅ Minimum balance of $100 USD
✅ One participation per giveaway type per period
rules_inline.important_rules:
• Each MT5 account belongs to the first user who registers it
• You can participate in ALL giveaway types simultaneously
• Independent cooldowns for each giveaway type
• Must confirm receipt of prize if you win
rules_inline.error_fallback: ❌ Error loading rules. Use /help for complete information.
